comments.body: can we just move all of resolution.pyx here? or are you planning on de-duplication *just* this one, e.g. it seems odd to move only this

This PR is moving only functions that use `get_dst_info`, i.e. the ones that can share code using a pattern like #35077 (once a non-perf-hurting variant is found).

I do think its likely we can get rid of resolution.pyx before long; there is only one function left there and it isnt used inside tslibs, so could go anywhere.
leaning towards putting it in fields.pyx

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +202,206 @@

def get_resolution(const int64_t[:] stamps, tzinfo tz=None):
    cdef:
        Py_ssize_t i, n = len(stamps)
